title: Eating in Islam - Should we drink or eat first? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: abdeh samir from pakistan's last question he says what should we do first eat then drink or drink then eat or have a mixture of the two there's nothing prescribed it's up to you you can eat and drink at the same time or in between or only drink without eating or only eat without drinking the preference is yours and there's nothing binding you to any of these choices and allah azzawajal knows best you
